phrase.item: Alhan, his mother's [son] Alhan,
Alhan is my gravedigger.
You are your mother's dad,
you are your mother's child,
You are your mother's gravedigger, and you are your mother's handsome [son].
Their mother offers herself up (ʝird) for them, their mother is their moth,
Their mother offers herself up (sadika) for them.
You are your mother's child, you are mother's parents,
And you are your mother's handsome one, and your mother offers herself up for you.
You are your mother's heart and soul,
You are your mother's gravedigger and your mother offers up herself.
Alhan is my soul, Ajan is my handsome [son]
You are my small baby, you are my handsome [son].
Their mother can sacrifice herself, their mother offers up herself.
Their mother is their moth, their mother offers up herself.
You are my [future] singer,
You are my doctor,
You are my wise one, you are your mother's soul.
You are your mother's handsome [son], you are your mother's child
You are your mother's liver, and your mother offers herself up for you.
You are your mother's dad, you are you mother's mom,
You are your mother's child, and your mother offers up herself for you.
Alhan and Ajan, they are my gravediggers.
They are my children, and their mother offers up herself for them.
You are your mother's handsome [one], and you are your mother's small baby.
They are their mother's gravedigger, and their mother offers up herself for them.
You are my heart and liver, you are my handsome small baby...
